subsection.name: Anarchy and order
subsection.p: This is an evolving product. We don't make the perfect design from the start. We'll prbably never make the perfect design. We are always ready to refactor and improve our code. We make the simplest possible solutions, and add features only when they are requested
We mess with each other's code. If only the author understands the code, it sucks. Feel free to change anywhere. Using Subversion, we can always undo. Use the following versioning workflow:

ol.li: Run tests to verify that everything works
Commit using a revealing log message
